Set under the high patronage of the Minister for Defense, this contest, whose final is public, is opened with all the students of the universities and French and foreign universities. The Ecole Polytechnique is the only university organizing such an event. This contest offers to the finalists the privilege to play a concerto for piano accompanied by the prestigious symphonic orchestra of the Republican guard. For your inscription to this contest, we invite you to consult with attention the payment as well as the heading concerning the inscriptions.
